name: Spiral Up
description:
Touch Down & Sprial Up!

An agonizingly difficult 2D Platformer that can be played by using only one hand, or two fingers to be more precise!


When on the ground, use Left-Mouse-Button to charge up your Spring

When in the air, move your mouse to rotate your body

And leave the rest to the in-game physics

Oh, and when at the point of giving up, try using your knowledge of in-game physics and your strategic thinking to figure out the route forward. Good Luck!
